Review.Titre: Was not the right product and customer…
Review.Contenu: Was not the right product and customer service is horrible

Review.Titre: I order a case for an Iphone 15 MaxPro…
Review.Contenu: I order a case for an Iphone 15 MaxPro but I received another case for IPhone 14 pro. When I requested a exchange Sena Case denied the exchange because they are not longer in business and they do not accept return or exchange. In other words I was scam buy the company.

Review.Titre: Sena Case Doesn't Fit.  No Return Shipping Label.
Review.Contenu: Sena's website claims their case is compatible with my iPad, but it doesn't fit, so I had to return it.  Sena refused to provide a return shipping label.  Essentially, I had to pay for their mistake.  One Star experience.

The case was horrible!!!I broke my new phone in a matter of days because there was no protection from the case.I am deeply disappointed and still stop ordering SENA wallet cases in the future. My wife already stopped ordering bc you stopped carrying female friendly designs.

I tried to purchase the same case 3 times starting in November 2022.  I received exactly the same incorrect case each time most recently May 2023.  Customer service wants multiple and duplicate photos each time and STILL sends the wrong case.  I am giving up.

Review.Titre: The iPhone 14 case that I bought is of…
Review.Contenu: The iPhone 14 case that I bought is of very low quality and my phone doesn't fit in it, although it is described to be adequate on the web sit. I paid $100 Canadian for that peace of sh...!  It is entirely inconsistent with my many previous purchases at Sena Cases.

Review.Titre: Return item  I bought the refund came…
Review.Contenu: Return item  I bought the refund came back in Canadian $ I pay 💰 US never got paid for mailing and about $25US and return $20 Canadian they send case for iPhone 14 I need iPhone 14plus so I am losing all the way .Love Sena case but I am looking at diferente cases.Thank you

Review.Titre: My phone slips off the magnetic…
Review.Contenu: My phone slips off the magnetic case(the magnet isn’t strong enough to hold the phone) the magnetic clasp does not stay closed, it pops back open.  I have had Sena case’s previously for my iPhone and loved them but do not like this one at all. It is not what I thought I was getting, even the color isn’t the same.  Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: I ordered a case and tempered glass…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a case and tempered glass screen protector for my phone. It arrived promptly, is labeled for my model of phone, but does not fit. I’ve emailed their customer service three times now and have gotten no response. I didn’t particularly care about receiving incorrect items, that happens. But the radio silence from their customer service is unprofessional.

Inferior quality of iphone 14 pro case.  Right side button barely works. Requires strong pressure for it to work. Do not buy wallet attachment.  Read other reviewers comments.  This ls not the Sena company of the past.  The fancy box and cloth bag sent with product is all show.

Not a very useful case. Every time I "pushed or pulled" my iPhone in or out of this very tight fitting case, the side buttons made calls to emergency, or the center button accessed the camera and took pics. After having to delete too many blank pics and deny too many emergency calls, I just went ahead and ordered a case from Apple, which is working great.

Hello, for years we have been buying and using and recommending only your products. We are since two months now Just frustrated That we are trying to get  a product and we are going through a really bad service both because the product did not arrive and the way to communicate with you is almost impossibleWe have turned from customers who all day tell everyone to purchase only Sena  to a frustrated customersThey say that a company is measured in the event of a malfunction, so you are failing here and there is no one to talk to have a nice day Miri

Lovely case, but the magnet that holds the case is weak, my phone has fallen multiple times, and the strap to close the case is too short, so it only holds two credit cards at most. I always buy Sena, and this is the first time I am not completely happy

Review.Titre: Size listings were incorrect and I cannot return the merchandise
Review.Contenu: I purchased two phone cases for my iPhone 6. The description said they would fit 6S which is almost identical in size to the six. However, when I received the cases both were too large And when I attempted to return them I learned they were not returnable. This was not very visible on the website nor was there any indication that cases would be so large. So I’m stuck with merchandise I cannot use and cannot return so no, not too impressed with SENA.

I purchased a Snap On Wallet for iPhone 13 Pro. Received it but the case was not deep enough to prevent the lower part of the phone from repeatedly popping out of the case. I tried to return it but Sena's Customer Service is run by Targus and they tried to make me jump through a bunch of hoops to get a Return Authorization. Take a picture, send it to us and we will decide. Then remember we deduct full shipping charges from the refund. Any you pay for return shipping too. Even though they advertise a 30 day return policy, they do not want returns and make it hard to do it. Ended up keeping it so they couldn't resell it again and double their profit. BEWARE

The case arrived damaged. It was bent where the fold for the stand is. It wouldn't close all the way, which caused the auto shut off to not work. I was given a hard time about getting the coupon discount towards placing a new order. After several emails back and forth, I was finally offered the discount. I reordered the case and the next case had the same issue, but it wasn't as bad. After my bad experience of trying to get the credit on the first one,  I decided to place a book on the case, hoping it would flatten. It still never flattened and the tablet dies after sitting overnight because it wont shut off. I called, but because it was past 30 days, I would have to pay for shipping to return. I ordered a different brand and ended up wasting $55 on a case that won't get used
Tried for several months to order a case.  Was sent the incorrect product 3 times.  Was unable to get a refund from the company.  Terrible customer service.

Review.Titre: I ordered a case for iphone 12 pro max
Review.Contenu: I ordered a case for iphone 12 pro max.  I had the case personalized.  The case arrived used looking.  They said couldn’t offer a refund because it was personalized.  Horrible customer service. Placed on hold for forever

Review.Titre: Not the same quality as in the past
Review.Contenu: Not the same quality as in the past.  Case's buttons barely function on my iPhone 14 pro.  The magnetic wallet does no work as rhe apple magnetic wallet.

Wanted to return the case but they make it so complicated and maddening you finally give up. It will be the last time I purchase anything from Sena. Bad customer service. Stay away from this company!!!!☹️☹️☹️

Review.Titre: I have tried several times to request a…
Review.Contenu: I have tried several times to request a return. No reply. The website states all returns must be within 30 days of purchase. I do not want to return the item without authorization. It has been over 2 weeks with no reply.

Review.Titre: I ordered a product but that was not…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a product but that was not what I received. It has been impossible to be in contact with Sena Cases and have it corrected.

Review.Titre: The product that was delivered was not…
Review.Contenu: The product that was delivered was not what I thought I was buying, I did not want a magnet to hold the phone, I wanted the phone to snap into the case like prior purchases.

I recommend you to avoid this company, which will charge you with more than 40 € in unexpected and not accepted costs of delivery, weeks after the order (when you can no longer go back). Moreover, the quality of the products is very low (the iPhone doesn’t recognise Siri when inside the case, and it automatically press buttons, so the iPhone can stay on all night by mistake).

I recommend you to avoid this company, which will charge you with more than 40 € in unexpected and not accepted costs of delivery, weeks after the order (when you can no longer go back). Moreover, the quality of the products is very low (the iPhone doesn’t recognise Siri when inside the case, and it automatically press buttons, so the iPhone can stay on all night by mistake).

Review.Titre: I have been a customer of this company…
Review.Contenu: I have been a customer of this company for ten years.  I recently moved and got a new phone.  So I ordered a new case.  I made a mistake in my address - and called to have this corrected.  I was told that there was nothing they could.  To let the item return to their company and I would receive a credit and could re-order the item with the correct address.  I waited for the credit, which never came, and called customer service again.  This time I was told that they would not issue a credit, but would resend the item to me.  At this point it has been over a month, so I had purchased another case to protect the investment in the new phone.  I customer service agent was rude and explained she could "escalate" the issue, but there would be no guarantee of anything.  Really, really bad experience.   I will never use this company in the future.

I haven’t received my product. Somehow the tracking shows delivered and still haven’t received anything. Called the company and they said they can’t do anything about it! Just have to contact the usps and they have no answer for my package!

Review.Titre: Case was very poor fit and leather…
Review.Contenu: Case was very poor fit and leather quality much poorer (far les supple) than previous cases.  Already purchased another leather case superior to this one from another supplier

Review.Titre: I have purchased several Sena cases…
Review.Contenu: I have purchased several Sena cases over the years! I was always happy with the product! I just ordered a case for my new iPhone 13 it does not fit well and the leather I’m not sure is even leather very poor quality. I am also very frustrated with their return policy. I am packaging it up today and sending it back we’ll see where it goes from there. I will not buy from them again. After posting here Sena reached out to me and claimed that their product was a good leather. I just disagree and they did everything but offer a refund. So purchase with caution.

Review.Titre: I am quite disappointed with SENA and…
Review.Contenu: I am quite disappointed with SENA and their cases. I purchased the iPhone 14 wrap case. I tried it once and the phone fell out twice.the wallet also does not stay on.  I decided I wanted to return it. I was just past the 30 days. Mainly because I was waiting for my iPhone 14 to come in. They wouldn’t budge on any returns. Said it’s their ‘policy’. No exceptions. I have been a user of SENA cases for over ten years. I loved the old wallet style. They will not have my business again.
This is a terrible company that will not send you a refund for a bought product. Their leather is terrible and they have no return policy. Stay away from Sena cases.

I have had Sena cases over the years but have never had to deal with customer service. Cases are top notch, quality and what I like. This time they were back ordered. Said they would come mid October. I called late November they did not call me to let me know that it was delayed. Called twice in December. Was told that either I could cancel the order or that they would put it on a rush shipping when it came in. I told them I would not cancel the order so the obvious thing to do would be to rush ship it when it arrived. Of course they did not do that, so when I saw it was being shipped I called and asked about my rush shipping. Ginger the one handling my calls and emailing me tried to pass the blame on to me and I said I never responded about the rush shipping. It’s obvious if I did not cancel the order that I would like rush shipping. It was supposed to come Saturday, it came on Tuesday. Worst customer service I’ve ever seen. They do not want to admit fault nor when it is their fault or on their end; they do not want to compensate the customer.

Review.Titre: If you are from Canada be aware about…
Review.Contenu: If you are from Canada be aware about buying any Sena products! The company has basically no return policy. If you want to return the product they want you to ship it back to them with tracking. That usually cost more than to buy the crap they sell. They would not refund me on my product that was supposed to be leather but appears to be some kind of vinyl made in China. On top of that I got a bill weeks later for $16.74 from FedEx to ship it to me. This company is a total rip off beware. I am updating this review as Sena cases just replied with the same response! I promise to post here once a month forever until they refund my money. Stay away from this company.Thanks for you reply Sena Cases! You charged ME the shipping and then want me to send it back with tracking shipment and you would make a decision on a refund! That shipping cost more than your vinyl iPhone case! So in my mind you do not have a return policy. So I will not stop letting the world know to STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY.
They sent me the wrong color case. I’ve called once and emailed them 3 times over 2 weeks and I still haven’t heard back from them. Terrible customer service.
Bought a case for iPhone 13. It doesn't fit at all. It pops up, the buttons doesn't match.

Review.Titre: It broke the first day I used it
Review.Contenu: It broke the first day I used it. The pocket liner became disconnected. Glue not as good as threads

Review.Titre: I used a similar case for my iPhone 8…
Review.Contenu: I used a similar case for my iPhone 8 Plus. It was perfect. I just received one for my iPhone 13 Pro Max. If I try to use just one plastic card, the case will not close.
I'm still waiting, nothing yet.
Horrible customer service! Cannot reach a human being. Communicating via text is the way to vommmunicate!
Sent me wrong case. I asked for replacement. Did not get it.
Disappointed that returning items is not available

Review.Titre: i ordered those spice racks in july
Review.Contenu: i ordered those spice racks in july. they told me they were on there way. even sent tracking .. still nothing. emailed them several times,, nothing. they kept my     30 buks and never sent my product. even contacted the BBB t hey never heard from them either. so please put it out ther for all to stay away from this place.. there total scammers.

Review.Titre: I'm having trouble getting a refund…
Review.Contenu: I'm having trouble getting a refund from this company.  I have sent the item back and they sent an email stating they received the item and still they give me the runaround and not getting a refund.  Please don't purchase from this company until you read all the reviews.  Good Luck.

Review.Titre: I ordered 2 spice racks back in July
Review.Contenu: I ordered 2 spice racks back in July.  Still have not received them and it is now December.  Cannot get any response via email, which is the only contact info given.  I can't even look up my order anymore.  I would not order anything from this company/website.

Review.Titre: Sena has charges my credit card without …
Review.Contenu: Sena has charges my credit card without sending the case to me. when I ask, they tell that the case is sold out. I tell them that charging the credit card without sending the order is illegal in Europe and is considered as if they stole the money, bad style. they asked if I wanted another case instead. I chose another case and told that I expected the order to ship pronto. Suddenly they cancel the order and tell that they will return my money. But I did not cancel the order! confused ? me too ! They do not seem to be in control over their inventory, which is bad when you run a company. only thing that went fast, was collecting my money.

Terrible quality, terrible customer service. Messaged them because i was unhappy with my product. CS rep said they don’t do returns or refunds. I said I was dissatisfied & they said that didn’t matter. I asked about customer service & said that I work with cell phones all day & would warn others about the terrible customer service & they said I could do that but didn’t think they deserve a bad review just because they don’t stand behind their products. So here’s my bad review. Edit: months later, they reached out for more information regarding my bad review. Unfortunately, I already gave them the opportunity to make this right, which the rep said they weren’t concerned about.

Review.Titre: I ordered the magnetic leather holster…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the magnetic leather holster for my iPhone XS Max. Unfortunately, this case does not fit if it has an Otterbox case. The company would not allow a return, so save yourself the $50.

Review.Titre: I'm very disappointed in my SENA case…
Review.Contenu: I'm very disappointed in my SENA case because it doesn't stay closed.  I tried to return it and was told I couldn't.  I would never recommend buying a SENA case.

Review.Titre: Case adds too much weight to tablet.

Review.Contenu: I purchased a case for my iPhone 11 pro max and love everything about it, except for the huge 3" scuff that came on it.  Scuff, not scratch.  It looks like a buffing wheel hit it really hard. If this review would let me post pictures, I would.  So I called the 1-800 number for SENA cases online and spoke to someone in customer service who explained to me, "these cases are made of heritage series leather and to just rub the blemish and the oil from your hands will make it go away".  I have many leather products, and I know oil makes things better.  I sent pictures of the scuffed case to the address they gave me.  I was later sent a message telling me they would contact me within two days, I assumed for a resolution to this problem.  That was a week ago, so I guess their quality control department was okay with the pictures of the obviously scuffed not scratched case.  Not very happy.

Review.Titre: Takes forever to get your order
Review.Contenu: Takes forever to get your order. I ordered it weeks ago and have still not received it. I may never get it. Customer service was rude and not helpful.
Stay awayORDERED A CASE FOR A iPhone xS in brown  and received  a xR in black and they refused to do anything about it . This is no way to do business
Please review your policies, they are terrible customer service

Review.Titre: Don’t like the big buttons sticking out…
Review.Contenu: Don’t like the big buttons sticking out of the case.
Wrong case sent. Size description not given.

Review.Titre: Still waiting for case to arrive!!
nicely made but too tight to be useful…
Review.Contenu: nicely made but too tight to be useful on iPhone miniunfortunately

Review.Titre: Nice products, but returns are painful
Review.Contenu: I have had Sena products before.  They are great quality, nicely made, well designed. But I gave them a less than stellar rating due to the difficulty of initiating a return. The user interface is archaic compared to any other online shop I've encountered.

Review.Titre: Great case unless you want MagSafe charging
Review.Contenu: The case is beautiful, high quality, and the leather smells great.  So why only two stars?  MagSafe charging has been around for over 2 years, and in my opinion is a must-have feature.  Nomad makes a similar case with MagSafe capabilities (I'm not affiliated with them in any way) that is also several mm thinner. We bought one of these after buying the Sean case

Iphone 14 wallet case:  Not well designed.  The leather may be too thick.  The case barely stays closed with no credit cards or cash in it, but will not stay folded once an item or two has been added.I would say customer service has bordered on rude.The Nomad wallet case is simpler and less luxurious, but at least well designed.

Review.Titre: The case lacks in several ways
Review.Contenu: The case lacks in several ways. I’ve had it just weeks and the corned which hold the tablet in place have cracked into small pieces. It has never been dropped or put in a bag and carried. It remains in 2 places solidly on different tables. I use my tablet when in bed or when watching TV in living room. The corners have crumbled for no apparent reason. Additionally, the tablet cover has no “gripping” power when attempting to use the cover to stand the tablet in various positions if not on a flat surface. I use it in my lap, but cannot get the tablet to stay in a slanted position. A lot of money for no good use.

Review.Titre: First leather case I bought from you…
Review.Contenu: First leather case I bought from you couple of years ago was great, very good quality leather, etc. so when I got a new phone I ordered a new black leather from you but the quality of it was not even near to what it used to be. Then I thought it was perhaps one bad batch of leather etc, so I ordered another one, for my daughter, and the feel and look of the leather was terrible again. You may have thought it was a clever idea to lower the  quality of  leather and save some money by doing that but in the same time none of my family and friends will ever order your products again.

Once I received the product, it was terrific. The shipping was problematic. Perhaps because it was shipped to Canada, the delivery service was not good. First DHL wrote to say that there was no such address. Then I added more information and they still couldn't find the address. Ultimately the package was found in a plastic bag (that was nice) hanging around the fire sign at the beginning of our driveway, not at our house. Thankfully we found it before someone else did. The case itself is just as advertised and nice. I wish that it had been available in more colors, but this is ok. I love the design of this case (it's my third one).

Review.Titre: I bought a case from them that was…
Review.Contenu: I bought a case from them that was clearly marked iPhone 11 Pro, but the case I received was definitely for the 11 Max. It was way too big, and when I requested to return the item, there was no option to exchange, and they were charging me shipping to return it.

Review.Titre: Price has gone up and not made in…
Review.Contenu: Postage to australia has gone up and the product is not made in America (China) the quality is poor Ive been purchasing from SENA for many years I will not puchase anything again
Unfortunately new iphone 13 pro case  is so tight it pushes  power button and calls police.

Review.Titre: I have had this case for 4 phones this…
Review.Contenu: I have had this case for 4 phones this is the first time I have been disappointed with the leather.

Review.Titre: The style and quality of the case has…
Review.Contenu: The style and quality of the case has really diminished since I use to buy them for my iPhone X.

Review.Titre: I don’t have the wallet case for my…
Review.Contenu: I don’t have the wallet case for my iPhone 14 Pro Max. I am not the case, I another case, instead.
Product flaw preventing wireless charging wasn’t listed

Review.Titre: The iPhone case for the 14 Pro is too small. You can only get the iPhone into the case with force.
Review.Contenu: The device is very difficult to fit in at all.

Review.Titre: I have purchased 3 different Sena cases…
Review.Contenu: I have purchased 3 different Sena cases and highly recommended your cases to fellow admirers.  Unfortunately, with my most recent purchase for my new iPhone 11pro, I added my usual cards and within the day, my plastic enclosure for the drivers' license had buckled.  Although your customer service was prompt in their reply, they suggested that I had used too many cards.  They then advised me that they would "allow" me a ONE time return - of course I would have to pay for the shipping return.  It was not a good experience, sadly and I have yet to return my Send case, even with it buckled.

Review.Titre: I am sure the iPhone 11 ProMax case…
Review.Contenu: I am sure the iPhone 11 ProMax case ordered is going to be nice as it looks in pictures. The 2 star rating is for the poor customer service. Short, brisk and poorly explained email responses for a delayed delivery by USPS is highly unacceptable. While I am tracking the case which has not moved from its last location of Anaheim, CA, in over 8 days, the customer service won’t put a tracking trace on it. Today I received a 6 worded response asking me to wait 48 hours for a resolution. USPS is notoriously an inefficient way of shipping and ultimately losing items. I would recommend using another form of shipping method.

Review.Titre: Cases are nice but don't trust their…
Review.Contenu: Cases are nice but don't trust their Warranty. My cases was 8 months old when it started to split. No useful support. They suggested I buy my own new case from their Amazon store.

Review.Titre: I am giving one star because there is…
Review.Contenu: I am giving one star because there is no economical delivery route to Europe and so the cases are vastly over priced. The products are generally good and I have bought a few, including the new racer iPhone X case. It was delayed for 3 weeks so I missed the birthday deadline. Then I was charged €28 tax and penalties on top of the $56 price tag. Sena could give Europeans the option to pay duties in advance and avoid the extra penalties (I called DHL to verify) but they cannot be bothered. So non-US citizens pay more than double in the end and wait 3 times as long. If you are in the US - buy a great case. If you are in Europe - don't bother - there are equally good and much, much cheaper alternatives with less hassle.

Review.Titre: The pouch is a little too tight for my…
Review.Contenu: The pouch is a little too tight for my iPhone.

Review.Titre: Did not fit the iPad it was designed…
Review.Contenu: Did not fit the iPad it was designed for...

I mistakenly got a case for an iPhone 12 Pro rather than a 14 Pro but can’t return it due to Sean company policy.  Also, they don’t make Wallletskins for 14 Pros, and I’ve used one of those since my iPhone 6.  Best wallet phone case ever.  I’ve had many people ask about it and I was glad to evangelize for Sena.  Oh well, life goes on. (I ended up throwing the 12 pro case away.)

Review.Titre: I originally ordered a sena case that…
Review.Contenu: I originally ordered a sena case that seemed to be an iPhone 12. It was actually listed as iPhone 12/iPhone 12 pro max. I had it personalized. But I didn’t understand how the pro max is different from pro, and just because it’s listed on your website as iPhone 12 doesn’t mean that’s exactly right. So I had to re-order. Grateful that Sena gave me a 20% discount on the re-order, but I would recommend you change your website to make it less confusing.

Review.Titre: Good leather but not MagSafe capable
Review.Contenu: I like the leather and the quality is good, but there is one dislike that I have a hard time with vs the Apple case it replaced for me. The compatibility with MagSafe attachments is basically not there. I can get a powerful corded charger to attach, but the MagSafe Battery Pack will not stick so forget using it while you are also using the phone.

Review.Titre: High shipping and processing costs for Canadian buyers
Review.Contenu: I ordered an iPhone case to be delivered to Canada. The only shipping option offered was the pricy 2 day Fedex service - ground UPS was not available.  A few days after receiving the case I got a bill from Fedex for duty, which was in addition to  Fedex's processing fee of $10.  By the time you add the premium shipping and extra duty costs, the final product becomes too pricy. I doubt that I will ever order on line from you directly. Perhaps there is / will be a Canadian vendor who carries your product

Review.Titre: it's a nice case but I liked my…
Review.Contenu: it's a nice case but I liked my previous one better - without the snap -- had the magnetic closure.  I also preferred the one piece of leather wrapping around the phone rather than the two separate front and back pieces sewn onto a middle strip. . . just not as elegant

I don’t know , I keep trying to just get a case for an iPad that seems like it’s been tested and used by the maker. Every iPad case I get ....any time you try to push any buttons on keyboard or screen on it the slightest pressure the thing falls backwards/ forwards doesn’t hold .years ago I got one from you with a magnetic hold was much stronger and much more valuable accessory but lately they’ve all been mediocre at best

Review.Titre: this is a very nicely designed case…
Review.Contenu: this is a very nicely designed case with good leather. however what I got is different than what you show on your website. the picture on the website is a different color than the one I got and does not have the print which you show on your website.

Review.Titre: Ph cases are really amazing no doubt…
Review.Contenu: Ph cases are really amazing no doubt suggest there is need some more improvement on deen leather wallet

Review.Titre: Quality phone cases, but costly shipping
Review.Contenu: Shipping charges to Canada are excessive, given that brokerage fees to FedEx are payable and not included in the price at check-out.

Review.Titre: Overall a bad experience because the…
Review.Contenu: Overall a bad experience because the case does not allow wireless charging.  Will not buy from Sena again

Walletbook case is very bulkyI've had a Sena case on my iPhone 8 Plus for a couple of years and loved it. I ordered a new case for my iPhone 12 Pro Max thinking it would be the same but was disappointed. The phone in the previous case was slim enough to fit in my pocket, the new case is so bulky the it would not fit. Quality of the leather and case is very good, it is just too bulky. Sadly I had to return it.
Like that it’s made of real leather and lightweight. Doesn’t have protection by the outlet/speaker.

Review.Titre: These used to be great cases
Review.Contenu: I have loved Sena cases for years, but this new one is far to big. They used to hold your phone snugly. The leather took time to stretch. Now the phone just flips around in far too much space. Very disappointing. Add high shipping and customs costs and this will be the last Sena case I buy. :(I have an iPhone 12.
Nice case, worth the money.  But phone will no longer work with magnetic charger, and the Sena specs said it would. 👎🏻
Ordered online, didn't use any service

The color is alright (wish there were more color choices), but the fit isn’t great. My last Sena case fit like a glove, but this one is almost too big and the sides flex and I keep dropping the phone because it isn’t a stable grip. Wondering if I just got a bad case or if the iPhone 11 Pro Max case just isn’t as good as the Xs Max case was.

Review.Titre: I used to love these cases
Review.Contenu: I used to love these cases, but the design for the iPhone 11 is not so great. I don't like the metal buttons for on/off and volume. they are metal and get stuck on clothes.  On prior models I've had, there was just a slot for the phone buttons themselves to be accessible.

Review.Titre: These cases are great when new but .....
Review.Contenu: These cases are great when new but the belt clip separates from the phone pouch at the top. So I have to buy a new one. Good for Sena but annoying , as when new the cases are the best available belt attached cases, but they need to redesign the clip to work for the life of the case

Nice case with a few issues. Top left corner doesn’t fit snugly in fact hardly at all. Also no hole for the mic at the top center. The magnet for closing is weak. Gave it 3 stars because otherwise it it works.

Review.Titre: Not easy to return this item.
case arrived a day early I thought it…
Review.Contenu: case arrived a day early I thought it was a fold over case but it is a shell case. Still a good value!

Review.Titre: I purchased a Future Folio case for my…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Future Folio case for my iPad Pro after destroying the original with a drop to a concrete floor. The case is well made and fits the iPad well. I am, however, disappointed in that there is only one adjustment for using the front cover as an easel, and the iPad must be used in horizontal format, but I knew the latter. Also, the front cover cannot be folded back on itself easily. I hope not to drop it again. Not sure how this case has been drop tested, and I don’t want to try…
Delivery cost are too high but everything else was perfect. The product itself is best and delivery was 1 day earlier as expected.

Good quality product.However, a tiny phone case was packaged in a huge box, whereas it could have been easily fit in a small envelope. This is inefficient, waist of resources, but most importantly caused a lot of headache with delivery company. If the package was small, they could have just dropped it in the mailbox, but instead they were torturing me with multiple unsuccessful delivery attempts and with their poor service on re-scheduling of delivery. It took me more than a week to get my package out from the delivery company.
I have used the phone covers produced by SENA quite few times before and have always been very pleased. This time is no exeption although the quality of leather is somewhat inferior.

Review.Titre: Deliver was fast and quality is almost…
Review.Contenu: Deliver was fast and quality is almost perfect for the case, there are some rough edges to it but the wallet for iphone 14 are the best!

Every time I upgrade my iPhone I purchase a new Sena leather covered case. They are good looking, tuff and fit well on my phone.  I was dis-appointed this time to see that you cheapened up and made one case that the camera frame that fits around the area of the lenses can be use to fit perfectly around the lenses of the iPhone 13 Pro but my ordinary iPhone 13 not so! There is a gap on the bottom and right side.  The Apple leather case fits perfectly. But Apple doesn’t have the built in pockets that you make. I compromised and kept yours.

Review.Titre: No Holster listed for iPhone 14 Pro
Review.Contenu: Wanted to buy a Holster for my new iPhone 14 Pro, but none were listed. Luckily, I knew the iPhone 12 holster would fit, so I order that instead. It turned out to be perfect for the 14.

Review.Titre: Should not be made in China
Review.Contenu: Still my favorite case. However, disappointing for me to see that built China and not made in the US. Not sure to buy again if this does not change, even if the quality is good.
You did great!  Although the cases didn't fit properly, I returned them both and got a refund without a problem.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: The iPhone 12 Pro case fits perfectly…
Review.Contenu: The iPhone 12 Pro case fits perfectly and is what was advertised. Good quality.The iPhone 13 case is meant for a iPhone 13 Pro thus DOES NOT fit my phone correctly.

Review.Titre: I love just being able to carry this…
Review.Contenu: I love just being able to carry this case with phone and credit cards, etc.  But it is not as light as I would want, so I switch around.  I carry it and then take the phone and credit cards out and put it back into my purse. This is OK for me.
The case looks very nice. I didn’t realize it didn’t have a magnet when I purchased it/had it engraved. The case needs a magnet to keep it closed.
2nd Case I ordered is good. The first one broke and still haven't received a label to send it back for a refund.

Review.Titre: Always use Sena when I get a new Iphone
Review.Contenu: Always use Sena when I get a new IphoneJust too bad that this time there was no black one for the Iphone 12
Got it quick and easy. Quality material.

Review.Titre: I bought a new iPhone 11 Pro Max and…
Review.Contenu: I bought a new iPhone 11 Pro Max and ordered a leather case from Sena.   I ended up ordering the wrong case, had to return it and order the one I really wanted.    New case arrived today and is very good.   Price was discounted so it was even better!The customer service person I dealt with to return the original case was polite and helpful.     I would recommend Sena to people who are looking for a good iPhone case at a fair price.

They were running a great discount on product and shipping. It cost slightly more to express ship. I prefer sena cases over all others I have used because of their quality. Only wish they had a case that snaps, and can also stand to view videos etc. for an iPhone 11 Pro Max. I like what I have but that would have made this an excellent purchase. Also their 2 day shipping if ordered on Wednesday or Thursday won’t get there until Monday.

Review.Titre: So far everything is top notch
Review.Contenu: So far everything is top notch.  I can give it 5 stars if it holds up well, but otherwise, would definitely recommend this product for folks who want Apple quality accessories.  I am picky and this is an exceptional case.  It is not going to be for those who want supreme protection, but is high quality for those who don't want the bulk and understand that.  Good job SENA Cases.  I didn't even know you were out there, but will let folks know now.

Review.Titre: Great case but you cannot charge with…
Review.Contenu: Great case but you cannot charge with it on.

Review.Titre: My husband loves his phone case
Review.Contenu: My husband loves his phone case. They last about 18 months with daily wear. Comfortable and good quality leather not too stiff not to thin.
It took way too long(over 5 business days) to receive a response to my request to return an item. I contacted them 3 times for a status.
Can't go wrong with a SENA case

Review.Titre: it's okay and nice and they are cheap…
Review.Contenu: it's okay and nice and they are cheap and really nice price stuff

Review.Titre: sorry you got rid of your older phone…
Review.Contenu: sorry you got rid of your older phone cases...but love this case

Review.Titre: Your stuff is good as compared to so…
Review.Contenu: Your stuff is good as compared to so many other brands.

Review.Titre: This is a well designed iPhone case.
Review.Contenu: This is well designed iPhone case.

Review.Titre: They make good leather products for…
Review.Contenu: They make good leather products for cellphones. Makes for a good impression at meetings.
Quality, well made products.  I’ve been buying your products for years.
The product is one of a kind and the personalization is well done. I'm saddened that this company is going out of business. They make a quality product.

Years ago, I bought a wallet version of this purse. Loved it, carried it, and stuffed it so full that the zipper broke. I still carried but there was always the risk that I would lose something. I replaced but continued to carry it. I went to website and found a larger purse version with the original red color which I love but even with broken zipper I can not throw it away!

Ordered as always and item arrived within 3 business days.  What else could you ask for, except a new I-Pad cover in about any form for my mini I-Pad.  Tnx guys and nice recovery from your interruption of business.

I researched competing products that would double as a wallet and an iPhone 13 Pro case. I wanted to pair down to 1 item doing double duty. Some of the alternatives simply attached to the rear of the phone and I just thought the risk of the card holder detaching was too great. This case is perfect.  Love the magnetic snap to keep the cards, cash and drivers license secure. Rich upscale leather with excellent craftsmanship.  I’ve received several compliments and inquiries using it over several days and extremely happy.  Definitely would recommend the manufacturer  and the specific model I bought.

Review.Titre: Ultraslim iPhone Pouches just the best
Review.Contenu: The Ultraslim iPhone pouches are top quality, are a good fit and look fantastic. Very smart pouches and great protection for the phone.Processing and shipping is very fast and I was impressed that FedX delivered my parcel to New Zealand in only 5 days. That is amazing.Thank you Sena.

Pros: Great websiteLovely products Superb serviceAmazing delivery speedCons: Crrrrrrazy fast delivery by no doubt highly unsustainable transport (air) which a. cost a fortune and b. I couldn't downgrade to a longer, cheaper, delivery option.

Review.Titre: The web site and the automated system…
Review.Contenu: The web site and the automated system could not provide the answers I needed to purchase the correct case. The person who eventually helped me took the time and made the effort to answer my questions and, if he did not know, he put me on hold and checked with his people to get it right!

I ordered a front pocket wallet in black from Sena and it's perfect. It's made of a rich, soft, full grain leather. Even down to the little details like the polka dots on the inside of the pockets to the burnished edges. Easily a more expensive wallet then the price suggests. I strongly recommend
Products are excellent. Experience is exceptional. Website is easy to use and got an unexpected bonus of 50% off! My order date happened to coincide with Amazon Prime Day.
Came within a week of ordering - very prompt considering it came from US to UK. Lovely case, good quality, husband will be very pleased. Monogramming was expensive for 2 letters but looks lovely.

Review.Titre: I purchased a leather watch band and…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a leather watch band and travel wallet for my husband for his birthday.  I was very happy with the quality of both products.  The process was easy to purchase and my items arrived very quickly, and that gets extra bonus in my book with the delays seen in shipments today.  I will look to SENA again for any other gifts I need to purchase.  Thank you for your quality products and timely service.  Easiest transaction ever!!!!

Review.Titre: Excellent iPhone 12 Pro Mac case!Excellent iPhone 12 Pro Max case
Review.Contenu: Excellent iPhone 12 Pro Mac case!.  Additionally, the slots for ID, driver’s license, business/credit cards and compartment for money makes this case invaluable.  Ready for new iPhone and appropriate case!

This is my third leather magnetic holster.  The last one had the leather cover come off the clip after just under 4 years of daily use but was still usable.  I bought a new one because of getting a new phone.  Looks nice, holds and protects your phone.

Review.Titre: If you want the best - don’t look beyond this brand.
Review.Contenu: All my portable Apple products - iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPad Mini, iPad Pro and MacBook Pro are protected by Sena cases. They are stylish, really well designed and made and are worth every penny.  I’m pretty sure that they are the best cases on the market - certainly for their price point.
I love my Sena case! Great product and design, super comfortable, and light weight. I have recommended this product to many coworkers and several have placed orders! Life long customer here!

Based on the Sena advertisement on FB, I decided to try the leather case for my iPhone 12. Great fit, great quality and it looks very professional. I will be looking to Sena in the future regarding my needs for an iphone case.

Review.Titre: The watch bands arrived quickly and…
Review.Contenu: The watch bands arrived quickly and were exactly what I was looking for.  High quality leather.  And what I have come to expect from Sena from past experiences.  Would definitely recommend the product and the company.
Quick shipment and fantastic product. This is my 3rd leather iPhone wallet case from SENA and it is the same great quality as the previous ones I've enjoyed.

I previously had the leather Sena case with wallet on the back and really liked it.  The new case seems to have included some improvements and better color option. Its hard to find a decent case with a wallet attached.  The leather is a bonus.  The case arrived just in time for my new phone.

Review.Titre: My preference is a case such as the…
Review.Contenu: My preference is a case such as the Sena cases rather than a case that covers the screen in clear plastic.  When I look at my phone, I want to see the actual glass surface rather than a plastic cover.
Great cases as usual, I ordered the case for Iphone13pro. One suggestion: I would have made the side 1/16 to 1/8'' wider to accommodate more credit cards or other things.
I love the products, the love that the company puts into customer "satisfaction" if the delivery shows up and the quality of the product! SENA for now already (at least) 8 years!!!

Review.Titre: The product was as described. Nice
Review.Contenu: The product was as described
Customer service quickly and easily resolved an issue I had with my order (I ordered the wrong size case!). All of my iPhones have had one of their amazing cases. Highly recommended.

I had previously used the wallet case when I purchased my IPhone 6.  It literally was my purse.  All I needed was my ID and credit cards.  When we upgraded to the IPhone 12 I knew that I would need a new wallet.  Sena cases are amazing.  Keeping their shape and even the smell of fresh leather.  Several times I dropped my 6 and never had a problem.  Fully protected.  I didn’t get my wallet for my 12 for a couple of weeks and my phone felt naked and unprotected in my hand.  I would highly recommend because it protects the IPhone and also it is the only thing you need.

Review.Titre: I was very satisfied with my last Sena…
Review.Contenu: I was very satisfied with my last Sena case , so when I bought the new I-phone 12 mini, I had no hesitation before ordering a new Sena case. Quite expensive, but well worth it.
I always get the largest iPhone case and when I use the phone I like to see the entire phone and find the protection of this case is unbeatable.

Review.Titre: Product is ok conform to the view on…
Review.Contenu: Product is ok conform to the view on the siteQuality is good. Just pay attention to delivery cost may be expensive if you are note located in big town
The case is exactly as advertised. Great color, well constructed, perfect fit for my iPhone mini, and feels very supple like leather should.

Review.Titre: Why are you looking for survey data…
Review.Contenu: Why are you looking for survey data now? Aren’t you shutting down?

Another new phone, another new Sena case. I’ve dropped my phones countless times over the years and always had Sena on them. So breaks, no cracks, no spiderweb fracture. I just got a new iPhone and I’m relieved to have a new Sena case protecting it.

Review.Titre: Lugano wallet toffee with gold initials…
Review.Contenu: Lugano wallet toffee with gold initials Third Sena and this is definitely a step above the others! Great quality and beautiful leather!

I have had sena case for years, on several iPhone’s.  Sena Cases are in fact the best case for your iPhone or Android phone what ever model you might have or want on the market today I have never had a case failure or breakdown or even had a broken phone due to the Sena Cases. I would rate Sena cases are the absolutely the best case on the market today five stars!!There Customer Service is 5 starsAlso keeping the customer needs and wants in mine! Great job Sena CasesBill Higgins

I have been using Sena Cases (Wallet skin) for at least 15 years.  In my opinion, they are the best designed and made cases available.  I have not seen one case that even comes close to your quality.  The wallet skin was definitely designed for the busy woman in mind.  I know that I always have everything that I need with me.  Thank you Sena for making my life easier all of these years.

Review.Titre: I am happy with my phone case and…
Review.Contenu: I am happy with my phone case and service I received after ordering. One suggestion I would like to make:- Could you have a slightly larger case to fit phone with protective cover on. Thanks

Review.Titre: I had ordered a iPhone 12 Pro Max holster for my husband from another company.
Review.Contenu: I had ordered a iPhone 12 Pro Max holster for my husband from another company and it was of very poor quality. I decided to try Sena.  The quality is great, it looks and feels wonderful and the price was very reasonable.  We are both very happy with your product.
Love the product, will use nothing else, you need to restock the basic black case for iPhone 12 though, had to buy a tan version.
Excellent leather products. I have purchased several iPhone cases and Apple watch bands. They are my first go to for Apple accessories.

Review.Titre: I’ve been buying cases from Sena for so…
Review.Contenu: I’ve been buying cases from Sena for so many years and they are always high quality.

Review.Titre: I love my IPhone 12 Pro Max Sena Case…
Review.Contenu: I love my IPhone 12 Pro Max Sena Case ❤️ It is such a nice quality and beautiful color (I bought it in Tan). I was so happy when I received it and saw how beautiful it was 🥰❤️

Review.Titre: Wonderful Design, Long lasting style and function
Review.Contenu: My husband and I have been enjoying Sena cases for over 10 years, the quality leather, functionality and style satisfy every need we have. Highly recommend.

Review.Titre: I do love the case except for one…
Review.Contenu: I do love the case except for one thing. I do not like the power button and two side button covers on this case. The power button has very sharp edges and all of the buttons are too large. The leather Apple case buttons werr so much better
Fast delivery. Top quality real full leather product. My third product from Senna and always highly satisfied.

I have not used a leather case on my phone (other than a wallet case) before now but was frustrated with the short lifespan of others even though I am careful with my phone. I really like this case. It is a simple and sleek design and feels good in my hand. I received my new case quickly!  I have an iPhone 11 Pro Max and snagged the Leatherskin case on sale. I would not hesitate to buy a case for my next phone from Sena. The have good quality products.

Review.Titre: Sean cases never lets you down!
Review.Contenu: Sean cases never lets you down. I have been using their sleeves since 2008 and they are still my first choice. They are a bit pricey but always pick thanksgiving right after launch if new iPhone :-)
Easy delivery and beautiful product that fits my needs. This case means my phone will fit in my cute little summer purses.
Great phone cases - this is my 3rd - the last one lasted since 2017 when I changed my phone. It's still going strong but I've now changed my phone again so needed a new case of a different size.

Review.Titre: Perfect phone case for my needs
Review.Contenu: Perfect phone case for my needs.  Very well made and beautiful leather.  The card slots are tight & secure. Recommend.
I am a return customer. The products are well made and look impressive. I recommend Sena cases.
My cellphone case arrived on time. The packaging kept the case secured and intact. The leather case looks really good and is well constructed.

Review.Titre: I wanted a specific style of case
Review.Contenu: I wanted a specific style of case. I was able to get it and ordering was very easy. My only issue was choice of color. With past purchases I was able to get my case in red. That choice is no longer available 😢. That being said, I still am happy with my purchase.
I am very happy with my case.   It arrived in a very short time and fit perfectly.  I wouldn't hesitate to order from SENA Cases in the future.
Very user-friendly site, the quailty of the product, the speed of the product delivery and the affordability of a quality product.  Utility.

Review.Titre: This is best possible sleeve for…
Review.Contenu: This is best possible sleeve for iPhone, I use it for now for many years and I don't want any other sleeve at all.

Review.Titre: The quality if your products are superb
Review.Contenu: The quality if your products are fantastic. This is the 4th case that I have bought from your company over the years and it has never let me down.

Review.Titre: Ordered and delivered half way around…
Review.Contenu: Ordered and delivered half way around the world in 2 days, wow, great product followed by great service, well done to all,

Review.Titre: I have been using Sena cases for years
Review.Contenu: I have been using Sena cases for years. As I purchase new cell phones, I need to update the cases since the phones are of a different sizes.  Very pleased with the quality and fit of the Sena cases.
The case is elegant. It was shipped and delivered as promised. High quality of the leather is appreciated.
Excellent product and excellent service. What else?May be more colours for your products.
This is the 3rd sena phone case that I have purchased over the years. I was introduced to the product by my friend. I absolutely love them. Would recommend.
Super thin and fit well, maybe a little at first but after you use for a few days then it’s just perfect.
Easy ordering. I’ve used Sena cases for several years and have always been satisfied.
Excellent quality as always. Long life, perfect fit, nice look. Great work by sena cases. Keep it up guys.
Good products, good price and fast delivery.

Review.Titre: Exactly as described I have purchased… when will not be disappointed if you buy these lovely quality
Review.Contenu: Exactly as described I have purchased these before and I love them. Great quality.
My one and only sleeve case for my iPhone for years now. Durable, good fit and elegant leather finish.
My leather case for my new iPhone 13 arrived on time. The leather and workmanship are high quality. This is my second case from Sena.
Very fast delivery by FedEx. Quality of the iPhone case as usual very good.
Love these cases! I’ve had one with each new phone I’ve gotten. They’re perfect wallets, good quality and they shop quickly and easily.

Review.Titre: Your staff was great and very helpful…
Review.Contenu: Your staff was great and very helpful and professional, you have a great product                         Bob Reynolds
Love SENA cases. Long time customer clear improvements in design and quality with time.

Looks fabulous but… Needs access to iPhone charger cord when case is zipped up.

Really well made and actual leather!
Quality product with awesome service free same day shipping

Review.Titre: I love my Sean phone case
Review.Contenu: I love my Sean phone case.  Beautiful leather and they are well made.  I received it right away as well.
Just what I needed. It’s nice not to have to carry both a wallet and a phone. The case is nice quality and is what I was looking for.
With every new iPhone, a new Sena case. Excellent quality and fit, as always.
Great cases. This is my fourth case from Sena cases and at this point, I would not choose phone cases from any other brand.
Excellent product. Fast shipment even if a bit expensive.

Review.Titre: No hard feelings but buying an item…

Case received as described
Lightning fast delivery!Wonderful product!Excellent quality!Fits my phone perfectly!Very stylish!
Good service. Very fast delivery from USA to London

Great IPhone 14 Pro Max case.  I have been buying the cases for my last four iPhone models, love the cases.

Review.Contenu: I love it just like all the phone covers I have bought.  Thank you so much for a product I can always count on.

Review.Titre: I’ve been buying Sena cases for many years and consider them the best cases.  Super quality leather and wears exceptionally well.
